Module HarmonixDsp
Header /Engine/Plugins/Runtime/Harmonix/Source/HarmonixDsp/Public/HarmonixDsp/FusionSampler/FusionSampler.h
Include #include "HarmonixDsp/FusionSampler/FusionSampler.h"

Syntax

class FFusionSampler : public FVirtualInstrument

Remarks

Make Fusion Sampler derive directly from virtual instrument.
